name: Charcoal Starter
description: For outdoor use only, this Charcoal Starter uses a chimney effect that concentrates heat to light the charcoal. Made from aluminized steel with a cool-touch handle (although, grill gloves are recommended when hot) for long-lasting use. Have charcoal hot and ready to use in minutes, the Charcoal Starter holds enough charcoal to fill most charcoal barbecue grills. To use, fill the underside of the Charcoal Starter with loosely crumpled newspaper or paper towel. Turn the Charcoal Starter over and fill the main chamber with as much charcoal as needed for your cook - a few large chunks of hardwood lump charcoal for smoking, up to a full load for some high heat searing. Once filled, light the paper on fire through the bottom vents of the starter. Allow the paper to burn off, which ignites the bottom coals. The heat from the bottom coals rises igniting the rest. Using heat-resistant gloves, lift the Charcoal Starter by the handle and pour the lit charcoal into your barbecue grill.

name: Charcuterie Board
description: Made from genuine Acacia hardwood, this Charcuterie Board is large and stylish, perfect for serving delectable charcuterie to a crowd. This set includes three ceramic serving ramekins for olives, dips, and anything else you can imagine. The naturally occurring oils provide resistance to liquid as well as resistance to fungi and microbes. The warm and rich grain comes in deep reds, golden yellows, and even purples making each board a unique piece. Easy to maintain, we recommend hand washing the board as needed, and not soaking. Use the beautiful, genuine leather handle to bring your board where it's needed or use it for stylish storage.

name: Chaska 25 DV Gas Insert
description:
High Performing, Compact Gas Fireplace Insert

If you need a gas fireplace insert that will provide plenty of warmth without dominating your living space, the Chaska 25 could be just what you're looking for. Benefiting from a compact design, this direct vent gas fireplace insert combines energy-efficiency and stunning performance with an attractive appearance and a size that's small enough for the coziest room. With ease, a professional installer can turn your wood-burning fireplace into a energy efficient gas insert fireplace that will fit effortlessly in the existing hole of your old masonry fireplace.
Fireplace Gas Inserts Give Excellent Performance at Every Level
Offering 26,000 BTU/hr output when run on natural gas and 25,500 BTU/hr on LP gas, the Chaska 25 produces enough heat for almost every room. A convenient full functioning remote control allows the temperature to be adjusted, ensuring your room is pleasantly warm all year round. Canada P-4 approved, this gas fireplace insert has efficiency of about 79% for both LG and natural gas. With such impressive statistics, there’s little wonder why the Chaska 25 is in such demand

Innovative Features on These Gas Fireplace Inserts Add Plenty of Value

From the high-quality materials that are incorporated into this stylish option through to extras such as an engineer-designed burner system, multiple screen front options, a fan kit and refractory brick lining, this appliance offers a wealth of features which greatly enhance its appeal. Each fireplace is designed to offer great value-for-money and provide a reliable source of heat that's efficient, helping to keep your fuel bills low by utilizing zone heating.

description: Use the Chef's Knife by Napoleon and you will never want to use another knife to prep your meals again. This German steel blade is razor sharp; easily gliding through whatever food you are working with. The ideal, all-purpose Chef's Knife will meet all of your cooking needs. The forged stainless steel runs the full length of the knife; the It is balanced from tip, all the way through the tang. The dual riveted handle provides ergonomic comfort while you slice, chop, dice, and mince. So whether you are a gourmet grill master, or a fanatical foodie, this Chef's Knife is perfect for all of your food prep needs.

name: Chicken Leg Grill Rack
description: Napoleon's Chicken Leg Grill Rack is ideal for one-pot meals and versatile enough to make many dishes at once, like chicken and paella. The upright rack allows for even cooking, holding up to 12 poultry legs or wings upright. Use the topper as a drip pan or to cook side dishes simultaneously or separately. Stainless steel is durable and dishwasher safe. The rack is foldable for easy storage.

name: Chicken Roaster
description: Clever, multifunctional and easy to maintain, every kitchen benefits from the addition of a Napoleon barbecue accessory. This Stainless Steel Chicken Roaster is a compact barbecue cooking tool that will ensure big flavor in your favorite meals. The unit itself is compact, taking up very little real estate on the barbecue grill. That means far more space for your favorite sides and other barbecued foods and more space for you when storing this barbecue grill accessory. The stainless steel chicken roaster accessory features a main single cylinder to support the chicken and hold the liquid. The cup that goes into the chicken holds 250 ml (1 cup) of your favorite liquid to both flavor the bird and keep the meat moist while cooking. Not just for beer, fill the cup with juice, wine, beer, marinades, or water and your favorite aromatics for a delicious roasted meal. A sturdy removable handle is also made from durable stainless steel. It easily slides into and out of a slot at the base of the main unit. Easily move, adjust and carry the chicken roaster with or without a bird. The stainless steel chicken roaster is dishwasher safe, so cleaning is easy.

Use the Napoleon Commercial Grade Rotisserie Kit for Large Barbecue Grills to produce restaurant quality meals right in your own back yard. The large commercial grade stainless steel hexagonal spit rod with commercial grade motor are up for any task you throw at them. The 4 prong commercial meat forks hold your food in place with easy to use thumb screws. And there is even a counterweight assembly, just in case you're cooking for an army. Specifically fits all PRO 500, P500 and LEX 485 series Napoleon grills. This easy to use barbecue grill accessory fits barbecue grill hoods up to 31 inches (78.74 cm) in width.

name: Commercial Quality Collapsible Rotisserie Forks

They come with two 4-pronged forks that slide easily to hold your meat in place and thumb screws to hold the forks on the spit. These Rotisserie Forks are made entirely of stainless steel, cleaning easily after use. Replacement forks for and rotisserie with 12mm hex rod or 8mm square rods.

name: Delray Series 36" DV IPI Basic Linear
description:
Minimalist & Elegantly Simple

Introducing the DELRAY Linear DRL3613. This minimalist residential gas fireplace offers elegance and efficiency at an entry level price point.

At a slim 14 ¼” framing depth and 4/7 direct venting, the DELRAY can add sleek contemporary styling to both new construction and retrofit installations at minimal impact to floor space.

The DELRAY Linear is a high efficiency, mobile home compatible fireplace that is ready to customize with any of our stunning burner media options. Combustible wood facing can be installed right down to the glass opening.

Additional features include heat management, propane conversion kits, trim kits, and more.

name: Digital Thermometer
description: Relax while cooking all your meats on the grill. The Fast Read Digital Thermometer will let you know when the meat is done. Without cutting into meat and potentially losing all of those precious juices, simply push the steel rod into the center of your meat or fish, the LED display will show the temperature within 4 to 5 seconds in either Celsius or Fahrenheit. Clean the stem with soap and water only, do not wash in the dishwasher. The best way to know if your food is cooked to safe standards and perfectly done to your liking is to use an accurate digital thermometer. Napoleon's Fast Read Digital Thermometer is ideal for use on the barbecue grill, oven and even the frying pan. Instantly know whether your meal is cooked to perfection without leaving it up to chance. Clever, multifunctional and easy to maintain, every kitchen benefits from the addition of a Napoleon barbecue accessory. Our accessories provide you with the essentials to create delicious grilled food and then some to enhance your cooking arsenal with a wide variety of creative additions to broaden your culinary horizons.

name: Dimplex 36" Multi-Fire® SL Slim Built-in Linear Electric Fireplace
description:
With an incredibly slim 4" depth, the Slim Linear lets you incorporate a stylish, linear fireplace into smaller spaces, like condos or townhouses. The Slim Linear electric fireplace sits flush into 2" x 4" framing - a game-changing and industry exclusive feature. Just because the unit is compact does not mean that you sacrifice visually. With a slender fit and a large viewing area, the Slim Linear is both functional and mesmerizing.

  • The Nova effect produces large, high-contrast flames with multi-layered colors to create a sense of depth and dimension, for a dazzling lifelike effect
  • Customize with multi-fire technology that allows you to adjust the speed of the flame to create the perfect atmosphere to suit your mood or room
  • A slim size doesn't sacrifice looks This smart design has an impressive viewing height of 14" and includes mirror technology that creates a grander illusion of depth

name: Dimplex 46" Opti-myst Linear Electric Fireplace
description:
Where quality and creativity meet, the new Optimyst® Linear combines leading flame technology, the popular linear style, exclusive customization, and modern controls. The patented Dimplex Optimyst® technology creates a unique 3D flame and smoke effect. The water vapor flame and the sound of a natural wood fire create a realistic wood-burning fireplace experience. Users can customize the flame and color effects to suit their personal tastes and enjoy operating their modern fireplace using Bluetooth® technology on a convenient smartphone app.

Features
  • Optimyst® uses patented technology to produce water vapor that closely imitates true flames and smoke. As the flames do not generate heat, the glass is cool to touch, making it safe for everyone.
  • Advanced, multicolor LED lighting projects onto the flames to help create the fire illusion.
  • There are no harmful emissions with the Optimyst® Linear; enjoy a sustainable, eco-friendly electric fireplace.
  • The Optimyst® can be placed anywhere to let your unique vision come to life. No chimney, gas lines, or venting required. Install the Optimyst® wherever your heart desires—the options are limitless.
  • The Optimyst® Linear includes wi-fi enabled options. Control your fireplace from anywhere with the Dimplex Flame Connect App. Adjust the flame intensity, colors, heater, and sound all through your phone. A physical remote is included as well.
  • Set the mood for you and your guests with new multicolor flame effects. The ability to control individual lights and mix different colors provide an added level of depth. Choose between a traditional amber glow or go contemporary using a full range of customizable colors—you also have the option to automatically rotate through colors.
  • Adjustable spacers allow for customizable flame shapes, generating a unique fire experience.
  • The Optimyst® provides a complete sensory experience with the option to emit a crackling sound at your chosen volume level.
  • The fully-sealed glass insert perfectly protects and stabilizes the fire—no need to worry about drafts disrupting the flames as it’s fully self-contained.

Click Here for more information

name: Dimplex Opti-Myst® Pro 1000 Built-In Electric Firebox
description:
Dimplex Optimyst® Pro 1000 Built-In Electric Firebox

Easily turn fireplace design concepts into reality with the Optimyst Pro 1000 Built-in Electric Firebox. Install as a single-sided unit, or remove the included backer panel and convert to a see-through design that opens the view between rooms. The discrete heater completes the functionality and ensures perfect comfort in addition to the dazzling Optimyst flame and smoke effect.
Features
  • The Optimyst flame effect uses revolutionary ultrasonic technology to produce a fine mist that creates the lifelike illusion of flames and smoke.
  • Have some fun and change up your customizable flame width by adding the included spacers and slots to your Optimyst cassette.
  • This unit is capable of showcasing double-sided viewing areas with the included removable high-gloss backer panel for easy conversion. To complete the transition you will need to purchase the rear glass pane sold separately (GBF1000-GLASS).
  • Can be used as a supplemental heat source. It includes an effective fan-forced heater that will warm up to 400 sq. ft.; the heater heats one side, even with the backer panel removed.

  • Have some fun and change up your customizable flame width by adding the included spacers and slots to your Optimyst cassette.
  • This unit is capable of showcasing double-sided viewing areas with the included removable high-gloss backer panel for easy conversion. To complete the transition you will need to purchase the rear glass pane sold separately (GBF1000-GLASS).
  • Can be used as a supplemental heat source. It includes an effective fan-forced heater that will warm up to 400 sq. ft.; the heater heats one side, even with the backer panel removed.

name: Direct vent vinyl siding standoff box.
Disposable Grease Drip Trays (6" x 5") - Pack of 5
description: Protect your grill and make it easier to clean by using these disposable aluminum Drip Trays in your barbecue grill. Used to collect grease and debris that may not be burned off while grilling, these trays go in the bottom of the grill at the back. As part of your regular grill maintenance, these trays should be checked and changed every four to six cooking sessions, depending on how much barbecuing you do. Dump any leavings from these Drip Trays and easily recycle for fast and simple barbecue grill maintenance. Use these on the barbecue for side dishes and food storage if preparing grilled goodies for a potluck as well. Just remember to give them a rinse and clean before use. Keep your Napoleon Grill clean and make maintenance easier by using a disposable drip tray today.

name: Disposable Grease Drip Trays for TravelQTM Series
description: Protect your TravelQ's grease tray with convenient disposable liners. Used to collect grease and debris that doesn't get burnt off during cooking, these trays fit all Napoleon TravelQ Series grills. These trays should be checked after 4 to 6 uses, or a heavy-duty grill session. These trays are particularly useful on camping trips and traveling, making it easy to ensure safety and cleanliness.

name: Distinction 36
description:
The Perfect Combination of Performance & Design

The DISTINCTION is an ultra modern single sided direct vent gas fireplace with a generous landscape viewing area and concealed linear burner. Every size in the lineup comes fully loaded, including LED lighting, and a multi-function Proflame 2 remote control.

The DISTINCTION fireplace is designed to elevate your home’s aesthetics while providing efficient and cozy heating, making it the ideal centerpiece for your living room or any other gathering area. The sleek and modern linear design adds a touch of sophistication to any room. Clean lines and minimalist profile ensure it seamlessly integrates into various interior styles, making it a versatile addition to your home décor.

The stunning flame is further enhanced with the addition of a non-intrusive micro mesh screen, black reflective glass panels and the convenience of a 30% turndown. For further heat control, we recommend our full range of Cool Wall Advantage heat management kits, which are compatible with every configuration of the DISTINCTION series.

name: Divine H38 Corner LEFT Contemporary NG
description:
The DIVINE Corner

The DIVINE Corner Multi-Sided Fireplace, where timeless charm meets modern convenience. With its traditional logset burner and captivating multi-sided design, this fireplace brings the allure of a classic wood-burning hearth into the 21st century. The meticulously crafted logset imbues your living space with rustic elegance, creating a cozy ambiance that harks back to cherished moments spent around a traditional fireplace. The DIVINE Corner’s multi-sided construction allows you to enjoy the warm glow of the flames from different vantage points, making it a stunning centerpiece that seamlessly connects various areas of your home.

With the included remote control, indulging in the comfort of the DIVINE Corner has never been easier. Adjust the flame height, control with the thermostat, and ignite or extinguish the fire—all at your fingertips from the comfort of your couch. Experience the luxury of a cozy ambiance with minimal effort as you create the perfect atmosphere for relaxation and cherished moments with loved ones. Immerse yourself in the unparalleled elegance and convenience that the DIVINE Corner Multi-Sided Fireplace brings, making it an exquisite addition to any modern home seeking both style and comfort.

Standard:

  • 15 lbs Glass Media
  • Remote Hi-Lo flame,
  • Multi-function remote control,
  • Micro mesh screen,
  • Battery backup

description:

name: Dual Outlet LP Conv. Kit ('17 units)
Dual Outlet LP Conv. Kit for Built-in Side Burner
Dutch Oven Lid Lifter
description: The Dutch Oven Lid Lifter is made from sturdy steel construction and easily lifts the lids off of hot pots and pans while keeping your hands safely away from the heat. The steel wrapped handle ensures safe use and a cool touch while easily lifting the lids of your dishes like the Napoleon Cast Iron Dutch Oven or Saucepan to check on the delicious food cooking inside.

name: E1060i Built-In Grills with Analog Thermometer w/ Magic View Window
description:
DIAMOND SEAR COOKING GRIDS

Diamond Sear Cooking Grids are superior! Diamond Sear Cooking Grids have a patented* design with bars that have a smooth flat top; each individual bar measures over .35” wide at the top covering over one half of the total cooking surface. Each bar is shaped to optimally transfer the heat from the burners to the cooking surface so food cooks faster and more evenly!

FLAVOR GRIDS

Flavor Grids perform by allowing heat to rise unobstructed from the burner to cooking grids. They disperse heat quickly and evenly flavor the food by vaporizing juices and minimizing flare ups and grease fires. They are also easy to clean and maintain.

CAST STAINLESS STEEL BURNERS

Burners Made of ¼” Thick Cast 304 Stainless Steel 304 grade burners weighing up to 12 lbs, featuring a lifetime warranty. Designed with a protective lip above the ports to prevent clogging from grease. Guaranteed for life.

CHARCOAL SMOKER BASKET

Enhance the flavor of the food you grill by adding charcoal or wood chips. The Charcoal/Smoker Basket grills with charcoal, or smokes with soaked wood chips. Stainless steel basket sits on top of the burner easily igniting the charcoal or wood chips.

ANALOG THERMOMETER

Analog Thermometer with polished stainless steel bezel is embedded in the hood. It is large and attractive with a forward angle for easy viewing.

ANGLED HALOGEN INTERNAL LIGHTS

The Echelon Diamond E660 and E790 grills have 2 internal halogen lamps. The E1060 grill has 3 lamps.

RECESSED INFRARED BACKBURNER

The Fire Magic Infrared Backburner is a stainless steel mesh encased efficient ceramic system which provides much more BTU heat for quicker more efficient rotisserie grilling. It includes a Stainless Steel Cover to protect the back burner when not in use.

OPTIONAL MAGIC VIEW WINDOW

All Fire Magic Echelon grills and Aurora (A790 & A660) Grills are offered with an optional Magic View Window, which allows you to monitor grilled foods without lifting the hood and losing valuable heat.

Click Here to get more information

name: E660i Built-In Grills with Analog Thermometer w/ Magic View Glass
description:
DIAMOND SEAR COOKING GRIDS

Diamond Sear Cooking Grids are superior! Diamond Sear Cooking Grids have a patented* design with bars that have a smooth flat top; each individual bar measures over .35” wide at the top covering over one half of the total cooking surface. Each bar is shaped to optimally transfer the heat from the burners to the cooking surface so food cooks faster and more evenly!

CAST STAINLESS STEEL BURNERS

Burners Made of ¼” Thick Cast 304 Stainless Steel 304 grade burners weighing up to 12 lbs, featuring a lifetime warranty. Designed with a protective lip above the ports to prevent clogging from grease. Guaranteed for life.

ANGLED HALOGEN INTERNAL LIGHTS

The Echelon Diamond E660 and E790 grills have 2 internal halogen lamps. The E1060 grill has 3 lamps.

FLAVOR GRIDS

Flavor Grids perform by allowing heat to rise unobstructed from the burner to cooking grids. They disperse heat quickly and evenly flavor the food by vaporizing juices and minimizing flare ups and grease fires. They are also easy to clean and maintain.

90 DEGREE DOUBLE WALLED HOOD

Double walled 304 stainless steel oven provides efficient heat retention for even heating. The oven opens to 90 degrees for easy access and efficient exhaust. The Teflon coated spring assist makes opening the oven smooth and accessible for all.

COMFORT TOUCH POLISHED KNOBS

Smooth, seamless lines with polished highlights that feature back-lit knobs (at 41°) with comfort touch grips and flame icons for convenience and safety (flame turns red when on).

ECHELON DRIP TRAY

Built with ball bearings for easy glide. Perfect size for easy handling. Use with Fire Magic drip tray liners for convenient cleanup.

ANALOG THERMOMETER

Analog Thermometer with polished stainless steel bezel is embedded in the hood. It is large and attractive with a forward angle for easy viewing.

Click Here to get more information

name: E660s Portable Grills with Analog Thermometer & Flush Mounted Single Side Burner w/ Magic View Window
description:
90 DEGREE DOUBLE WALLED HOOD

Double walled 304 stainless steel oven provides efficient heat retention for even heating. The oven opens to 90 degrees for easy access and efficient exhaust. The Teflon coated spring assist makes opening the oven smooth and accessible for all.

CAST STAINLESS STEEL BURNERS

Each bar is shaped to optimally transfer the heat from the burners to the cooking surface so food cooks faster and more evenly!

CHARCOAL SMOKER BASKET

Enhance the flavor of the food you grill by adding charcoal or wood chips. The Charcoal/Smoker Basket grills with charcoal, or smokes with soaked wood chips. Stainless steel basket sits on top of the burner easily igniting the charcoal or wood chips.

CHROME DIGITAL THERMOMETER WITH MEAT PROBE

State-of-the-art electronic thermometer display, with meat probe, has an impressive array of features including: Built-in oven light switch Choice of 4 colors for back lighting

RECESSED INFRARED BACKBURNER

The Fire Magic Infrared Backburner is a stainless steel mesh encased efficient ceramic system which provides much more BTU heat for quicker more efficient rotisserie grilling. It includes a Stainless Steel Cover to protect the back burner when not in use.

HOT SURFACE IGNITION SYSTEM

Hot Surface Ignition System is the most advanced and reliable lighting system available. Simply push in the control knob to activate the hot surface, turn up the gas, and light your grill. 110V electricity needed.

ANALOG THERMOMETER

Analog Thermometer with polished stainless steel bezel is embedded in the hood. It is large and attractive with a forward angle for easy viewing.

Enhance the flavor of the food you grill by adding charcoal or wood chips. The Charcoal/Smoker Basket grills with charcoal, or smokes with soaked wood chips. Stainless steel basket sits on top of the burner easily igniting the charcoal or wood chips.

ANGLED HALOGEN INTERNAL LIGHTS

The Echelon Diamond E660 and E790 grills have 2 internal halogen lamps. The E1060 grill has 3 lamps.

CHROME DIGITAL THERMOMETER WITH MEAT PROBE

State-of-the-art electronic thermometer display, with meat probe, has an impressive array of features including: Built-in oven light switch Choice of 4 colors for back lighting

RECESSED INFRARED BACKBURNER

The Fire Magic Infrared Backburner is a stainless steel mesh encased efficient ceramic system which provides much more BTU heat for quicker more efficient rotisserie grilling. It includes a Stainless Steel Cover to protect the back burner when not in use.

HOT SURFACE IGNITION SYSTEM

Hot Surface Ignition System is the most advanced and reliable lighting system available. Simply push in the control knob to activate the hot surface, turn up the gas, and light your grill. 110V electricity needed.

Click Here to get more information

name: E790s Portable Grills with Analog Thermometer Flush Mounted Single Side Burner w/ Magic View Window
description:
90 DEGREE DOUBLE WALLED HOOD

Double walled 304 stainless steel oven provides efficient heat retention for even heating. The oven opens to 90 degrees for easy access and efficient exhaust. The Teflon coated spring assist makes opening the oven smooth and accessible for all.

CAST STAINLESS STEEL BURNERS

Burners Made of ¼” Thick Cast 304 Stainless Steel 304 grade burners weighing up to 12 lbs, featuring a lifetime warranty. Designed with a protective lip above the ports to prevent clogging from grease. Guaranteed for life.

DIAMOND SEAR COOKING GRIDS

Diamond Sear Cooking Grids are superior! Diamond Sear Cooking Grids have a patented* design with bars that have a smooth flat top; each individual bar measures over .35” wide at the top covering over one half of the total cooking surface. Each bar is shaped to optimally transfer the heat from the burners to the cooking surface so food cooks faster and more evenly!

CHARCOAL SMOKER BASKET

Enhance the flavor of the food you grill by adding charcoal or wood chips. The Charcoal/Smoker Basket grills with charcoal, or smokes with soaked wood chips. Stainless steel basket sits on top of the burner easily igniting the charcoal or wood chips.

RECESSED INFRARED BACKBURNER

HOT SURFACE IGNITION SYSTEM

Hot Surface Ignition System is the most advanced and reliable lighting system available. Simply push in the control knob to activate the hot surface, turn up the gas, and light your grill. 110V electricity needed.

ANALOG THERMOMETER

Analog Thermometer with polished stainless steel bezel is embedded in the hood. It is large and attractive with a forward angle for easy viewing.

name: Eclipse Smart Heat Electric Portable Incl Dimmer Control & Remote
description:
Eclipse Smart-Heat™ Portable

The Eclipse Smart-Heat Portable is a powerful electric outdoor heater that brings radiant warmth, light and style to design-focused outdoor spaces. This portable electric outdoor heater incorporates ground-breaking heat transfer technologies that result in a high-efficiency outdoor heater and dimmable LED light unit with minimalist, yet striking design aesthetics.

The Eclipse Smart-Heat Portable comes with our Eclipse Dimmer Controller and wireless remote, so you can quickly adjust both the heat output and gradually dim the lights to achieve the right level of comfort required for any situation.

Click Here for more information

name: Eclipse Smart Heat Electric + Twin Pole
description:
Eclipse Smart-Heat™ Electric

The Eclipse Smart-Heat Electric series will allow you to go straight from dinner to drinks thanks to its dimmable LED lighting rail and 3 different heat settings. With its sleek ceramic screen and matte black appearance, the Bromic Eclipse Smart-HeatTM series strikes the perfect balance between ambience, style, and functionality.

In addition to the complimentary 24″ Twin Pole, the Eclipse Electric can be paired with five other striking pole designs, including wall-mounted and ceiling-mounted options. For the ultimate in convenience, combine this sleek heater with the Bromic Smart-HeatTM Eclipse dimmer controller and wireless remote to accurately adjust the heat and light coverage from the comfort of your seat!

Click Here for more information

name: Eight Stainless Steel Multifunctional Skewers
description: Create perfect portions with Napoleon's Eight Stainless Steel Multifunctional Skewers. These reusable skewers are made with dishwasher safe stainless steel to provide years of delicious feasts. Custom made meals are easy, slide your favorite meats and veggies onto these skewers. Cook over direct heat for perfect sear marks, or use indirect grilling for a more slow roasted and tender service. Never worry about your food sliding off and falling into the grill. The ridged ends keep whatever you skewered secure, for perfect grilling. You'll never run out of ideas for an easy meal with Napoleon's Eight Stainless Steel Multifunctional Skewers.

name: Electric Patio Heaters Value Controls - Duplex/Stack Switch Assemblies
description:
● Using this control with a dual element heater allows each element to be wired individually, giving you a choice for 50% power or 100% power.
Where the INF controls are limited to 15 amps or 3000w heaters, the duplex assemblies may be used on 4000w, 5000w and 6000w dual
element units.
● Maximum 20 amps per pole

name: Electric Patio Heaters Value Control - Simple On/Off Switch Assemblies
description:
• Low cost control option for all single element heaters
  • Maximum 20 amps per pole

name: Electric Patio Heaters Value Controls - INF Control Assemblies
description:
● Incremental intensity (INF) control assemblies - this control allows the heater to oscillate on and off based on the setting selected.

● Maximum 15 amps, can be used on heaters up to 3000W (IT-W3024SS or IT-SL-3024B)IT-14-4092

name: Element
description:
The

ELEMENT

As our smallest fire feature, the Element is the perfect accent to your personal outdoor living space. Its modest 20-inch perimeter, barreled walls, and cupped-shaped body make it ideal for staging on balconies, terraces, and near open edges. The Element will provide a warm and intimate touch to your open-concept landscape and cityscape views.

Click Here for more information

name: Elevation™ 36
description:
DESCRIPTION

The foundation of our gas fireplace offerings, our Elevation 36 Direct Vent Gas Fireplace features our hand-painted split oak log set that shows off the fire from every angle. This fireplace is customizable with decorative backer panel offerings and finishing trim kits in black, charcoal, gunmetal and copper. Include the optional UHM (Universal Heat Management) to increase your comfort. UHM is a passive heat management system that circulates the heat throughout your room to ensure increased comfort when making memorable moments in front of your fireplace.

KEY FEATURES

  • Up to 26,000 BTU's
  • 43 9/16" H X 38 5/8" W X 22" D
  • Optional Heat Management for reduced clearances to combustibles
  • 5/8" Top Venting - Will accept Flex and Rigid Venting
  • Full View Safety Barrier
  • Battery back-up control system
  • Tempered Glass
  • Dual Flame Pan Style burner
  • Zen front available in both Charcoal and Black
  • Finishing trim available in Black, Charcoal, Gunmetal and Copper
  • Optional Universal Heat Management system
  • Optional Remote Control and Blower
  • Optional Decorative Panels including
  • MIRRO-FLAME™ Porcelain Reflective Radiant Panels, Westminster, Old Town Red, Newport, Glacier and Ledgestone Panels

Click Here for more information

name: Elevation™ X 36
description:
DESCRIPTION

Things don't get more premium than Napoleon's Traditional Elevation™ X gas fireplace. Feature loaded with an electric ember bed with realistic glowing embers that are visible from every angle and an included heat circulating blower, this fireplace is beautiful form with high function. Nearly infinite design options include ultra high definition log options in beachy Driftwood, traditional Split Oak, and bright Birch. Several trim, decorative front, and decorative brick backer panel options are available to ensure your favorite spaces flow together. Control this fireplace easily with the included remote or from the comfort of your favorite mobile device. The optional Dynamic Heat Control™ PLUS System allows heat from the fireplace to be directed to any living area in the home that needs it, even if the power goes out. Make the Elevation™X the stylistic focal point it should be or keep it the traditional and understated crown jewel of your home.

KEY FEATURES

  • 44"h x 38 3/4"w x 22"d
  • Up to 37,000 BTU’s
  • Clean face design with full firebox flame
  • Three Ultra High Definition Premium log set options include: Driftwood, Split Oak and Birch
  • Zen front available in both Charcoal and Black
  • Whitney and Denali premium fronts available with three accent Colour options
  • Finishing trim available in Charcoal, Black, Gunmetal and Copper
  • Ten decorative brick kits include MIRRO-FLAME™ Porcelain Reflective Radiant Panels, Westminster™ Standard and Herringbone, Newport™ Standard, Old Town Red™ Standard and Herringbone, Ledgestone Antique White, Glacier Herringbone and Standard, as well as Black Illusion Glass
  • Modulating "ENDLESS EMBERS™" electric ember bed fills the floor below the logset and are visible from every angle
  • Heat circulating blower included
  • Optional Dynamic Heat Control™ and Dynamic Heat Control™ Plus
  • Remote control included controls flame modulation, split-flow, ember bed lights and blower
  • eFIRE Remote App - total control of your fireplace from your mobile device with the same features as the remote listed above
  • Natural gas and propane models available. Ask your local Napoleon dealer for more information.

Click Here for More Information

name: Elite SSE 500 NG Stainless 3-Burner Built-in Grill
description:
Features

  • SABER’s patented cooking system heats evenly eliminates flare-ups and uses 30% less propane
  • Reliable electronic ignition at each burner for an easy start every time
  • All stainless steel firebox and internal components for durability
  • Internal halogen light and above-knob LED illumination for easy nighttime grilling
  • Annealed 304 stainless steel finishes and mirror polished edges offer stylish sophistication
  • Multi-position premium 304 stainless steel warming rack for added cooking versatility
  • Includes a marine-grade cover and a rotisserie motor kit and rod
  • Superior-strength mounting flanges ensure built-in convenience for outdoor kitchens and islands
  • Easily convert from natural gas to liquid propane with the SABER® EZ Liquid Propane Conversion Kit (sold separately)
    • Weight (Pounds) – 117.5
    • Main Burner Count – 3
    • Primary Burner BTU’s – 24000
    • Side Burner BTU’s – NA
    • Total BTU’s – 24000
    • Cooking System Type – IR
    • Primary Cooking Surface (sq. in) – 500
    • Secondary Cooking Surface (sq. in) – 175
    • Total Cooking Surface (sq. in) – 675
    • Primary Cooking Grate Material – SS 304 Stainless steel
    • Secondary Cooking Grate Material – SS 304 Stainless steel
    • Gas Convertible – EZ LP Kit A00AA5517 required – sold separately
    • Fuel Source – NG
    • LP Tank Included – Tank not included
    • Carton Size (inches) – 30.7 L x 28.7 W x 24.4 H
    • Retailer – Dealer Exclusive
    • L 13.8 inches X W15.9 inches – 31.625 L x 26.5 W x 21.625 H
    • Cutout Dimensions* – 28 1/4 L x 22 W x 9 H
    * Actual mounting flange dimensions. Add 1/8 – ¼-inch for installation.

name: Elite SSE 670 NG Stainless 4-Burner Built-in Grill
description:
Features

  • Patented Saber infrared cooking system allows you to cook up juicier and more flavorful meals than traditional systems that use dry convection air. The unique SABER cooking grates and infrared emitters prevent flare-ups and direct airflow away from the cooking surface, providing evenly distributed, indirect heat for maximum moisture retention while grilling.
  • The burners, emitters, and cooking grates are made of 304 commercial grade stainless steel, ensuring long-lasting performance in your outdoor kitchen.
  • Four(4) 8,000 BTU gas burners, provide evenly-distributed heat across a 670 square-inch cooking surface. An adjustable, stainless steel warming rack folds down to keep foods warm and can be folded away for additional space when using the included stainless steel rotisserie spit motor and spit rod (rotisserie kit included).
  • Precisely manage grilling temperatures across four cooking zones using individual LED illuminated burner control knobs, ensuring reliable start-up with integrated push-button electronic ignition.
  • The Saber Grills EZ assembly cart features fully-enclosed, 304-grade stainless steel storage space with a condiment basket, stainless steel access door with a roll-out tank tray, and heavy-duty, nylon locking casters for easy placement.
    • Overall Dimensions: 40 1/8" Wide x 21 5/8" High x 26 1/2" Deep
    Cutout Dimensions: 37 1/8" Wide x 9" High x 22" Deep

name: Elite SSE NG Dual Burner Built-In Side Burner
description:
Description

  • Mirror-polished edges and handles
  • Two individually controlled burners for low heat or high heat
  • Premium 304 stainless tube burners up to 18,000 BTU's
  • Premium 304 stainless steel construction
  • LED lights over the knobs for nighttime grilling
  • Integrated lid design for superior weather-resistance
  • Reversible premium 304 stainless steel grate for flat top or round top surface
  • Great for wok and skillet cooking, boiling or frying
  • Fuel type - Natural Gas

name: Enameled Cast Iron Reversible Griddle for PRO 500 & Prestige® 500 Grill Models
description: Napoleon's Reversible Cast Iron Griddle is the perfect addition to your outdoor kitchen. The 13-inch by 17.75-inch (33x 45.1cm) cooking surface is perfectly proportioned for our Prestige™/PRO® 500 series and LEX 485, 605, and 730 grills. Turn your grill into a breakfast station. Caramelize onions while you cook your burgers. Grill your favorite sandwiches, Panini style, on the reverse side of the griddle. The possibilities are endless for the Reversible Cast Iron Griddle. Season it like you would your grandmother's cast iron frying pan, the black cast iron with porcelain coating gets better every time you use it. The convenient little holes in the top allow grease to drain away from your food for the crispiest bacon, and succulent sausages. Get the Reversible Cast Iron Griddle to take your already amazing Napoleon Grill to the next level.

name: Enameled Cast Iron Reversible Griddle for Rogue® 425 Model Grills
description: Turn your grill into a breakfast station with the Reversible Griddle for the Rogue® 425 Series. Caramelize onions, cook bacon, produce perfect potatoes, and so much more! Get your sizzle on with this reversible griddle that can replace the cooking grids, or sit on top of them. The cast iron has a porcelain coating just like our cast iron cooking grids so it seasons up like your favorite cast iron frying pan. The huge 115/8 by 17¾“inch surface is great for making fried onions and mushrooms to accompany your main or create that delicious breakfast to enjoy al fresco.

name: Enclave 48 Single Sided
description:
Step Into a World Where Flames Dance in a Mesmerizing 3D Spectacle with the ENCLAVE Zero Clearance Direct Vent Bay Peninsula Gas Fireplace. A Gathering Point that Transcends Ordinary, the ENCLAVE by Marquis Invites You to Be Enthralled from Every Angle, Creating Not Just a Fireplace, but a New Dimension in Your Home. Versatility Meets Visionary Design - Whether Single Sided, Corner, or Bay Peninsula, Your Space is Transformed with Customizable Liners and Accessories, from Driftwood Logs to Contemporary Rocks. Ignite the Extraordinary with ENCLAVE’s Innovative Vented Chase Technology, Allowing Combustible Materials Right Up to the Glass Door, and Let Your Home Be the Canvas for Captivation.

Standard Features

  • Accent Lighting:
  • Enclave 48/60/72 – LED Lighting (non-dimmable)
  • Enclave 34 – Halogen Lighting
  • Zero Clearances to TVs and Artwork
  • Invisible Glass Safety Barrier
  • Proflame II Models include Remote Control with the following features: flame adjustment, thermostat, smart thermostat (WIFI Compatibility*) and accent lighting control

* Smartphone (local WIFI only)

BENEFITS OF OUR VENTED CHASE TECHNOLOGY

  • No fans required to vent the chase, will work during power failures (batteries required)
  • Allows for all wood framing
  • Combustible materials may be used right up to the glass door opening
  • Seamless glass, removes the need for steel safety screen barrier
  • Allows for reduced mantel clearances
  • Ultra-low TV clearances

Proflame II

Optional Features

SURROUND

Black or Stainless; Single-Sided Models only

LINERS

Enclave 48/60/72 – Reflective Glass, Fluted Brick, and Stacked BrickEnclave 34 – Reflective Glass, Fluted and Traditional Brick

MEDIA OPTIONS (REQUIRED)

Glass Media (Glacier Ice, Cobalt Blue, Black, Bronze, White)

ADDITIONAL MEDIA (OPTIONAL)

Cannonballs, Decorative Stones, Contemporary Rocks (natural and multi-colored) or Ember Chunks

LOG SETS

Oak, Birch, and Driftwood Sets

ENCLOSURE GRILLS

Front or Sides – Unfinished

CORNER KIT

Available for Bay Peninsula Unit

SIDE EXTENSION PANELS

Black; Single-Sided Models only

HEAT DISTRIBUTION SYSTEM

Plenum (Enclave 48 only)

Download The Manuals Here

name: Entice 36
description:
DESCRIPTION

Completely transform any space with the Entice 36 Wall-Hanging Electric Fireplace. The full flame pattern creates a striking visual impact, especially with the ability to change the flame color and ember bed to match your mood and style. Have full control over your fireplace with the remote, easily adjusting the flame intensity, colors, ember bed color, brightness, blower, heat output, and timer. Ready to go right out of the box, no gas fitter required, just hang the Entice on the wall and plug in. The shallow depth means that this fireplace doesn't intrude into your living space. A reflective rear panel expands the depth of the flames for a more immersive experience without taking up physical space in your room. For a more seamless look, this electric fireplace can be fully or partially recessed into a wall. See the fireplace and not the frame with a minimalist, nearly frameless finish. Complete any room with an easy-to-install Entice 36 Wall-Hanging Electric Fireplace.

KEY FEATURES

  • The Napoleon Entice™ 36 Wall Hanging Electric Fireplace is 16.94-inches tall, 36-inches wide, and 5.4-inches deep (43.03 cm tall, 91.44 cm wide, 13.82 cm deep)
  • Quickly heat large rooms up to 400 square feet thanks to the robust heat output of 5000 BTU's and 1,500 Watts powering the unit
  • Ready to use right out of the box, just hang on the wall and plug it in to a regular 120V outlet
  • The black, nearly frameless finish surrounding this modern, linear, electric fireplace creates a minimalist look that doesn't interfere with your décor, instead it enhances the fire aspect of the fireplace
  • The controls are easy to use, illuminating when you need them and dimming to hide when not in use. This ensures you have complete control without the illuminated buttons detracting from the overall look of the fireplace while you are relaxing
  • Easily match the flames to your décor or even your mood by selecting one of three flame Colour options: cool and inviting blue, traditional and lively orange, or a beautiful combination of the two will set the mood every time
  • Enjoy this fireplace any time of day with the high intensity LED lights in both the flames and ember bed, ensuring that no matter how bright it is, you can still take pleasure in the view of your fireplace
  • Large crystal clear cubes sparkle with contemporary luxury, reflecting the beautiful Colours of the flames and the ember bed lights
  • Installation is fast and easy with the included bracket for hanging. The unit is ready to go right out of the box, only taking a few minutes and couple of screws to hang
  • This fireplace can be installed recessed fully into the wall, meaning that it won't protrude into the room at all. This provides a clean and seamless, contemporary look
  • Don't get up, you can operate this fireplace from the comfort of your favourite spot with the included, full feature, remote control

Click Here for more information

BrochureInstallation Manual

name: ETS Two-stage Heater 100000 BTU NG (LPG) - 17'
description:
HEAT. STYLE. LUXURY

The sleekest tube heater on the market today. At less than 7” deep, we deliver a modern, sleek heating solution to our clients outdoor space.

  • In addition to its lean profile, the ETS delivers the most event heat pattern on all models
  • Perfect for colder areas and higher hanging requirements
  • Shipped standard with deco grille, requiring minimal assembly on site
  • Energy savings; our upgraded blowers yield lower start-up current and lower power consumption
  • Our models include: a 9′ length and three 17′ lengths, all dual output ranging from 40,000 BTU/hr to 100,000BTU/hr
  • All models are built standard with marine-grade aluminum
  • Stainless Steel mounting bracket packages available – custom lengths or design upon request
  • The ETS is CSA approved for outdoor, non-venting applications, rain wind or shine

name: Executive 3 Piece Toolset
description: Napoleon's Executive 3 Piece Toolset is made from cast stainless steel for added durability and ease of cleaning. All three pieces feature ergonomic handles that are easy to grip and comfortable to hold. The large spatula is perfect for steaks and other large food with its bladed tip and serrated edge. The easy-lock stainless steel tongs are always ready for action, their comfortable grip making it easy to hold and move your grilled delicacies. Don't forget to splash on the sauce with the silicone basting brush. Be the boss of your grill with the Napoleon Executive 3 Piece Toolset. Whether you are refining your favorite cooking techniques on the barbecue or learning an entirely new way of preparing a meal, Napoleon has the barbecue accessories you need.

name: Executive 4 Piece Toolset
description: Napoleon's Executive 4 Piece Toolset is made from cast stainless steel with comfortable ergonomic handles. The only knife you will ever need, the Napoleon Executive Chef Knife is made from German steel and razor-sharp; it's the ideal all-purpose knife. The large spatula is perfect for steaks and other large food with its bladed tip to easily get under food and the serrated edge for slicing and cutting on the fly. The easy-lock stainless steel tongs are always ready for action, their comfortable grip making it easy to grasp and move your grilled delicacies. Don't forget to splash on the sauce with the silicone basting brush. Be the boss of your grill with the Napoleon Executive 4-Piece Toolset. Clever, multifunctional, and easy to maintain, every kitchen benefits from the addition of a Napoleon barbecue accessory. Our accessories provide you with the essentials to create delicious grilled food and then some to enhance your cooking arsenal with a wide variety of creative additions to broaden your culinary horizons.

name: Expandable Rib Holder
description: Napoleon's expandable rib holder accessory is made of easy-to-clean stainless steel. The design is perfect for one to six racks of ribs. Expand this rack to take up as much or as little space on your barbecue as needed, it fits all models of cart-style barbecues and kettle grills. This rib rack also folds down for compact storage when not in use. Don't stress about cleaning this barbecue accessory, simply throw the expandable rib holder into the dishwasher. Clever, multifunctional, and easy to maintain, every kitchen benefits from the addition of a Napoleon barbecue accessory. Our accessories provide you with the essentials to create delicious grilled food and then some to enhance your cooking arsenal with a wide variety of creative additions to broaden your culinary horizons.

name: EZ NG Conversion Kit - for units that end in 17 or 21
description:
SABER grills come equipped for liquid propane, but with the SABER EZ Natural Gas Conversion Kit, you can easily convert a SABER grill to natural gas. This conversion kit will convert any liquid propane grill with a model number ending in “17” or higher.

  • Easily, quickly and safely convert your SABER grill from liquid propane to natural gas
  • Fits models ending in “17” or higher
  • Includes appliance-style natural gas regulator, 10-foot hose, 8-inch hose, stop pins and orifice tool

name: Fast Read Thermometer
description: Relax while cooking all your meats on the grill. The Fast Read Digital Thermometer will let you know when the meat is done. Simply push the steel rod into the center of your meat or fish, the LED display will show the temperature within 4 to 5 seconds in either Celsius or Fahrenheit. The compact design conceals probe for safe and convenient storage and the unit features an auto shut-off after 5 minutes. Clean the stem with soap and water only, do not wash in the dishwasher.

name: Firenze Bay 72-20
description:
Firenze™ by DaVinci Custom Fireplaces™

Custom Fireplace Look and Quality, Without the Custom Fireplace Price.

The Firenze™ Collection features four distinct models, all featuring 20” tall frameless glass, a linear silhouette, and DaVinci’s signature inviting flames. The Firenze™ Collection is the perfect solution for those seeking the style and advanced luxury features of a DaVinci, with the warming capabilities and value of a heater-rated fireplace.

Firenze™ fireplaces are 25K-50K BTU heater-rated appliances (a 50% turndown) that feature a quiet, remotely located, 400 CFM convection fan that efficiently distributes warmth throughout spaces up to 2,500 square feet, ensuring year-round comfort, especially during those chilly winter nights.

name: Five Cast Stainless Steel Cooking Grids for PROTM & Prestige® 500
description: deal for upgrading or replacing cooking grids on both Prestige® and Prestige PRO™ 500 gas grills. This package contains a set of five cast stainless steel cooking grids featuring Napoleon's iconic wave grid pattern. Includes a grid for the Infrared Sear Station Side Burner. Stainless Steel grids are highly durable, making them ideal for grilling.

name: Flexible Grill Basket
description: Create a multitude of different meals with the Napoleon Flexible Grill Basket. This high-quality stainless steel grilling basket gently cradles food between two hinged sides to ensure that food is cooked without sticking to the cooking grids or burnt. This barbecue grill accessory is ideal for cooking delicate filets of fish, vegetables and especially fantastic for sandwiches. The Napoleon Flexible Grill Basket makes handling multiple delicate foods effortless. Integrated handles mean that moving, flipping, and adjusting meals on your grill is super simple. The durable stainless steel of the Napoleon Flexible Grill Basket heats evenly. Please remember to handle the stainless steel flexible barbecue grill basket while wearing heat resistant gloves as the surface gets hot. The Flexible Grill Basket is easy to clean; just throw it in the dishwasher for a quick wash cycle, so it's ready for your next grilled creation. The durable stainless steel is dishwasher safe. Creating delicious meals and desserts using the Napoleon Flexible Grill Basket are only limited by your imagination.

name: Format 36" Floating Mantel Wall Mount
description:
Add a spark to any room with the wall-mount electric fireplace. Plug it in to savor glowing colors, backlit ambiance, and modern linear styling in a budget-friendly room makeover.

Wall Mount: Facilitates fast and easy installation with a simple wall mount kit for easy placement.
Multifunction Remote: Thermostat, lighting, on/off control at your fingertips.
Adjustable Heat: Enjoy year-round with or without heat.

description: Ideal for upgrading or replacing cooking grids on the BIG44 Built-in 700 Series Gas Grill. Contains a set of four stainless steel cooking grids featuring Napoleon's iconic wave grid pattern. Stainless Steel grids are nearly maintenance-free and highly durable for grilling.

description: Ideal for upgrading or replacing cooking grids on the Triumph® 495 Gas Grill. Contains a set of four stainless steel cooking grids featuring Napoleon's iconic wave grid pattern. Stainless Steel grids are nearly maintenance-free and highly durable for grilling.

name: FPX 3615 HO GSR2 Clean Face Gas Fireplace
description:
WHAT’S THE MAGIC

The 3615 is the smallest model in our HO (High Output) Linear lineup. This fireplace is perfect for intimate spaces like bedrooms and cozy dens. The 3615 features 33,000 BTUs and has a heating capacity of up to 1,700 square feet. This “clean face” fireplace has very little metal surrounding the glass and offers you the choice of minimal trims, along with beautiful Fyre-Art™ options. The 3615 is a Deluxe model that comes standard with a 180 CFM convection fan, Accent Lights and the GreenSmart® Remote Control.


  • Heating Capacity: Up to 1,700 Sq. Ft.
  • BTU Input Per Hour: 18,331 (NG) 17,555 (LP) to 33,000 (NG/LP)
  • Steady State Efficiency: Up to 75.22% (NG), 77.38% (LP)
  • EnerGuide P4 Efficiency: 61.96% (NG), 64.08% (LP)
  • Glass Viewing Area: Ceramic Glass, 34-1/8″ W x 13″ H, 440.6 Sq. In.

name: FPX 4237 Ember-Glo Clean Face GSR2 Gas Fireplace No Log Set
description:
WHAT’S THE MAGIC

The grandest of our premium fireplaces, the 4237 Top Vent (TV) Clean Face Deluxe is a massive showstopper that is perfect for great rooms with its 42” wide by 37” high glass and generous heat output. The magic of the 4237 lies within its ability to express the appeal of an open masonry fireplace while embodying the performance and functionality of Fireplace Xtrordinair’s superior gas heating technology. This fireplace features the new Ember-Fyre® II Burner, Ember-Glo™ ember bed lighting, and Comfort Control™, which allows you to turn down the heat output up to 77% while maintaining a beautiful fire display all year-round. This “Clean Face” model features a sleek, decorative trim.

This full feature Deluxe model includes the GreenSmart® Remote Control, 260 CFM Convection Fan, and overhead Accent Lights. Add the CoolSmart TV Wall™ option to safely install a TV above this fireplace.

  • Glass Viewing Area: Ceramic Glass, 39-7/8″ W x 34-7/8″ H, 1388 Sq. In.

name: Freestyle 365 Natural Gas Grill, Graphite Grey
description:

The Freestyle 365 Natural Gas Barbecue is a compact grill with premium features and unbeatable value. Ignited by the instant JETFIRE ignition system that lights the main burners with a jet of flame easily, every time. Get the perfect sear over the cast iron porcelainized enamel cooking grids. Three stainless steel burners provide heat that can be easily controlled by ergonomic knobs and monitored by the onboard temperature gauge. The rugged wheels allow this barbecue to go where the action is, while the easy-to-fold side shelves, featuring tool hangers and a bottle opener, make sure that the Freestyle meets your lifestyle and space.

name: Galaxy 38" Panorama
description:
Ignite Your Imagination with the Savannah Galaxy Fireplace Series

In the realm of home design, where warmth meets artistry, the Savannah Galaxy Fireplace Series has emerged as a testament to innovation without bounds. This new series redefines the very essence of fireplaces, pushing the boundaries of safety, aesthetics, and functionality. Created from the ground up, the Savannah Galaxy Series invites you to experience a new era of fireplace design where high-definition reflective flames dance before your eyes, unobstructed and awe-inspiring.

Traditionally, fireplaces have been a blend of comfort and style, yet they often necessitated the use of safety screens that detracted from the overall visual appeal. The Savannah Galaxy Series, however, has shattered this paradigm by introducing cutting-edge double-wall glass technology. This breakthrough innovation not only provides protection from heat but also ensures that the glass remains safe to touch, all while preserving the mesmerizing beauty of the flames.

Genesis Fireplaces, the pioneers behind this new generation of linear gas fireplaces, have unveiled a revolution that eliminates the need for unsightly screens. The Savannah Galaxy Series embraces seamless design, allowing you to indulge in the full splendor of the fire without any visual obstructions.

Here are the key features that make the Savannah Galaxy Fireplace Series a game-changer:

1. Stunning High-Definition Views of the Flame: Prepare to be captivated by the breathtaking high-definition views of the flames. The Savannah Galaxy Series elevates the fireplace experience to a whole new level, making it a mesmerizing centerpiece of your living space.

2. Sophisticated Lines: These fireplaces are not just sources of heat; they are works of art with sophisticated lines and designs that seamlessly integrate into any interior decor, from modern to classic.

3. Build Simplicity: Installation and construction are a breeze, ensuring that both homeowners and professionals can enjoy the benefits of this remarkable series without complications.

4. Maintenance-Friendly: Bid farewell to the worries of constant upkeep. The Savannah Galaxy Series is designed to be maintenance-friendly, allowing you to relish your fireplace without the stress of frequent servicing.

5. Clear View with Double Wall Glass Technology: Experience a completely clear view of the flames thanks to the innovative double-wall glass technology. It not only enhances safety but also provides an unobstructed view that's second to none.

6. Warm Glass System: Safety touch glass ensures that the glass remains comfortably warm to the touch, even when the fire blazes within.

7. Easy Clean: No need for a technician to maintain your fireplace. Cleaning is simple and hassle-free.

8. Radiant, Thermal, and Convection Heat: The Savannah Galaxy Series doesn't just look stunning; it also offers efficient heating solutions. Radiant heat emanates naturally from the fire, while thermal heat is created as air flows over the radiant heat. Additionally, convection heat gently circulates warm air into the room, ensuring comfort and coziness.

The Savannah Galaxy Fireplace Series is not merely a collection of fireplaces; it's a revolution that celebrates ingenuity and design without compromise. It invites you to reimagine the possibilities of fireplace aesthetics, safety, and functionality. With the Savannah Galaxy Series, you can embrace the future of fireplace design, where your vision is the only limitation. Say hello to an unobstructed world of warmth, beauty, and innovation, courtesy of the Savannah Galaxy.

Click Here for more information

Brochure / SpecsOwner's Manual

The Savannah Galaxy Fireplace Series is not merely a collection of fireplaces; it's a revolution that celebrates ingenuity and design without compromise. It invites you to reimagine the possibilities of fireplace aesthetics, safety, and functionality. With the Savannah Galaxy Series, you can embrace the future of fireplace design, where your vision is the only limitation. Say hello to an unobstructed world of warmth, beauty, and innovation, courtesy of the Savannah Galaxy.

name: Galaxy See Through
description:
DESCRIPTION

The Napoleon Galaxy™ See Thru Outdoor Gas Fireplace is truly unique with a linear, sleek modern design adding to the excitement of outdoor living. Napoleon's Galaxy™ See Thru outdoor linear gas fireplace is also available as a one-sided (GSS48) unit and is constructed of weather resistant brushed stainless steel for maximum outdoor durability. The Galaxy™ See Thru features a glass wind deflector to ensure operation in windy conditions as well as a safety valve that turns the gas supply off if the flame goes out.

name: Gas Grill Cleaning Toolset
description: A deep clean is a large part of your barbecue's seasonal maintenance, make that task easier with the Napoleon Gas Grill Cleaning Toolset. Set includes an angled cooking grid cleaning brush with a grid scraper, a venturi tube cleaning brush, a firebox scraper that won't damage the steel, and a burner port cleaner that is stored in the firebox scraper.

name: Genuine Leather BBQ Gloves
description: Genuine Grey Cowhide Leather Gas Grill Gloves provide the user with heat protection when working with the heat from your barbecue grill thanks to the reinforced stitching, and quality fit with greater dexterity. Genuine grey leather and reinforced stitching ensure that when you are handling hot stuff, your hands remain safely cool and comfortable. Convenient hanging loops keep these handy hand accessories close by so they're ready when you are. The extra-long length protects your forearms from grinding debris, welding sparks, hot coals and open flames, hot kitchen ware and hot steam, whatever you happen to be doing. The soft and comfortable lining cradles you securely and provides an extra layer of protection.

name: Gourmet Burger Press Kit
description: Easily and quickly form the perfect hamburgers, stuffed burgers and delicious sliders using the Napoleon Gourmet Burger Press Kit. Whether you are making burgers and sliders ahead of time for freezing or fresh for dinner tonight, perfectly round hamburgers can be made quickly and easily. Make hamburgers as thick or thin as you want. Make stuffed burgers by removing the cover from the handle and pressing an indent into the meat. Fill that indent with your favorite ingredients like cheese, mushrooms and hot peppers. There is no limit to the creative fillings you can use. The surface of the burger and slider press are non-stick making it easy to remove the patties as they're prepared. The burger press has a removable bottom plate for easy extraction. Make two perfectly portioned patties at once in the slider press. Taking out the fresh patties is easy with the removable bottom plate and handle. All parts of the Napoleon Gourmet Burger Press Kit are dishwasher safe, so cleaning is a breeze.

name: Grey driftwood Allwood wall system for 60” Orion Slim
description:
ALLWOOD MEDIA WALL SYSTEM

Transform your favorite room entertainment space with our wall system. Ideal for rental or condo to have your own fireplace & media wall. Available in three colors.

name: Grid Lifter
description: Napoleon's Grid Lifter grilling maintenance accessory is a handy tool to have. The Grid Lifter provides you with the leverage to easily lift the heavy cooking grids on your grill. Sometimes something that shouldn't falls through the grids. The Grid Lifter allows you to safely lift the hot and heavy cooking grids to get to the problem. You can also use this handy tool to move the sear plates on your grill. The Grid Lifter features a strong metal body that extends into the handle and is riveted in place by stainless steel rivets. The hardwood handle is heat safe and durable, providing a comfortable place for your hand. The convenient leather loop makes it easy to hang and store this little tool.

name: Grill Brush with Brass Bristles
description: Use the Brass Grill Brush to keep your grill's cast iron cooking grids clean. A clean grill is a happy grill. You should brush the stuck on foods from your grill with a grill brush after every time you grill, while the grill is still hot, and again before grilling your next meal. The brass bristles on the Brass Grill Brush will not damage your cooking grids but will last a long time. They are gentle enough to use on our porcelain coated cast iron cooking grids. The Napoleon Brass Grill Brush is 18 inches long, giving you easy leverage for getting at that tough stuck on food, and has a metal scraper on the head for particularly tough spots. The Brass Grill Brush features a hardwood handle that has a hanger for easy storage. The handle is also ergonomic and makes it easy to quickly clean off the grime, Keep your grill clean with the Napoleon Brass Grill Brush.

name: Grill Brush with Stainless Steel Bristles
description: Napoleon 62118 18-Inch Grill Brush with Stainless Steel Bristles provides a high quality grill tool to help keep your BBQ grill sparkling clean. The black hardwood handle offers a durable yet aesthetically pleasing construction, while the stainless steel bristles work to clean your grill grates as the integrated metal scraper gets the harder to clean bits. Upgrade your grilling experience with help from Napoleon.

name: Grill Handle Light for PRO/TravelQTM 285 Portable Grill Models
description: Whether you're out adventuring or in the backyard the TravelQ™ Grill Handle Light ensures that you have enough light to grill gourmet after the sun goes down. Designed for Napoleon's TravelQ™ Series Portable Grills, this sleek design easily clips directly onto the handle. Two AA batteries provide up to 60-hours of illumination time, so you won't run out of light when grilling after dark.

name: Grilling Pincer Tongs
description: Whether you are refining your favorite cooking techniques on the barbecue or learning an entirely new way of preparing a meal, Napoleon has the barbecue accessories you need. The stainless steel Grilling Pincer Tongs are perfect for when you need a light touch, with veggies and seafood. The tweezer shape and dexterity are great for gently holding and moving the delicate foods that you love to eat, like scallops, cherry tomatoes and shrimp. Remove feather casings when preparing poultry for dinner. The fine, serrated tips provide a strong and secure grip on foods while working. The textured ridges on the grip ensure that fingers don't slip while using the tongs. These tongs are made from durable stainless steel so they will last a lifetime and are super easy to clean. Just throw them into the dishwasher so that your Grilling Pincer Tongs are ready to help you prepare your next culinary masterpiece. Never suffer from shredded scallops, or fumble your asparagus when grilling any longer. Use the Grilling Pincer Tongs by Napoleon instead. Only Napoleon accessories provide you with the essentials to create delicious grilled food and then some to enhance your cooking arsenal with a wide variety of creative additions to broaden your culinary horizons.

name: Grilling System Set (includes - veggie basket, double pepper roaster, roast & rib rack, 4 skewers, steamer tray, roasting pan and cutting board)
Grill Light
description: Don't let the sun dictate when you can and cannot barbecue! Use this high-powered LED Grill Light to illuminate grill areas of up to 18-inches (45.7 cm) by 36-inches (91.4 cm). This outdoor light features an adjustable grill handle clamp that is perfect for the handle of your Napoleon Barbecue Grill but it will easily fit just about any barbecue. Use this handy, battery-powered light when camping, hiking and exploring too. Four high-powered LED lights last for up to 50 hours of use and feature a high and low setting to ensure you have exactly the right amount of illumination. Don't let the weather stand in the way of a delicious meal, this Grill Light is weather-resistant, made to handle the elements. Batteries are included.

name: Grill Mat for Large Grills
description: Protect what's under your barbecue grill and show your Napoleon pride with the Napoleon Grill Mat For Large Grills. Great for ensuring your deck and patio are safe from oil and grease damage, this easy-to-clean mat is ideal for larger gas barbecue grills and measures 90 by 35-inches (228.6cm by 88.9 cm). If you're using a charcoal barbecue grill, this fire-resistant mat is perfect for providing protection against accidentally dropped coals and errant sparks. The non-slip, diamond plate pattern is a stylish grey color, ideal for upping your grill's flare factor while protecting your beautiful outdoor living area. This product is not recommended for use on composite decking. Clever, multifunctional and easy to maintain, every kitchen benefits from the addition of a Napoleon barbecue accessory. Our accessories provide you with the essentials to create delicious grilled food and then some to enhance your cooking arsenal with a wide variety of creative additions to broaden your culinary horizons.

If you're using a charcoal barbecue grill, this fire-resistant mat is perfect for providing protection against accidentally dropped coals and errant sparks. The non-slip, diamond plate pattern is a stylish grey color, ideal for upping your grill's flare factor while protecting your beautiful outdoor living area. This product is not recommended for use on composite decking.

name: Grill Roasting Pan
description: Napoleon's Drop-in Grill Roasting Pan is 28.6 inches (72.6 cm) deep and made to perfectly fit the Rogue® and Freestyle® model gas grills. Remove the cooking grids and drop in this convenient pan, ideal for indirect cooking, casseroles, lasagna, baking, roasting, and so much more. Meals are easy and fun with the addition of the delicious flavors of barbecue. Featuring drop-in handles for easy removal and storage. The porcelainized enamel finish is smooth and makes cleanup simple, just wipe it out with soapy water, it won't rust. The drop-in Grill Roasting Pan is easy to use, simply remove the cooking grids on the barbecue grill and replace them with the drop-In Grill Roasting Pan. When the food is ready, remove it from the barbecue using heat resistant gloves. You can serve directly from the Roasting Pan. Whether you are refining your favorite cooking techniques on the barbecue or learning an entirely new way of preparing a meal, Napoleon has the barbecue accessories you need. Clever, multifunctional and easy to maintain, every kitchen benefits from the addition of a Napoleon barbecue accessory. Our accessories provide you with the essentials to create delicious grilled food and then some to enhance your cooking arsenal with a wide variety of creative additions to broaden your culinary horizons.

name: Healthy Choice - Starter Kit
description: Making healthy choices when it comes to grilling a meal is even easier with the Napoleon Healthy Choice Starter Kit. The Stainless Steel Multifunctional Topper features two different sides, the perforated side is ideal for grilling veggies, while the flat side is perfect for searing delicate foods like fish and scallops, or cradling a wooden plank (not included) so you get that great smoky flavor without worry that the plank will burn. The reusable Stainless Steel skewers allow you to create custom kebabs with any vegetables or protein you wish. Raise delicate foods, like fish, off the cooking grids to prevent sticking, with the Flexible Grill Basket. Great for securely holding veggies, seafood, and it's superb at making grilled sandwiches. All parts are easy to clean; just toss them into the dishwasher. Make it easier to make healthy meals with Napoleon's Healthy Choice Starter Kit.

name: Heat Resistant BBQ Glove
description: Never worry about burns again when handling hot objects. The Napoleon Heat Resistant Gas Grill Glove handles hot things up to 475°F and is good for use in the house, outdoors and anywhere things are getting hot. This glove is made from aramid fibers, used in the aerospace industry; a soft cotton liner provides maximum comfort and grey silicone grips line the glove on both sides so nothing will escape your grasp. ReveRSIBle for left and right-handed people, this glove is also machine washable, so if you spill, there's no worry about cleanup.

name: Heavy Duty Rotisserie and Shroud for PRO/TravelQTM 285 Portable Grill Models
description: Turn your Napoleon TravelQ™ into a pizza oven and rotisserie grill. The innovative design creates the perfect environment for beautiful rotisserie meals and perfect restaurant-quality pizza. The innovative design features a detachable door providing easy access to your pizza. Made from durable stainless steel, this barbecue accessory easily fits into the TravelQ™ and provides long lasting and easy to clean fun, just like on a full-sized gas barbecue. This kit contains a heavy duty rotisserie motor, spit rod, two rotisserie forks, stop bushing, and stainless steel shield with door. Clever, multifunctional, and easy to maintain, every kitchen benefits from the addition of a Napoleon barbecue accessory. name: Heavy Duty Rotisserie Kit for all Rogue® Grill Series
description: Whether you have a compact Rogue® 365, 425 or a large Rogue® 525 Series Model, this Stainless Steel, Heavy Duty, Multi-Piece Rotisserie Kit will fit your needs. The two four pronged forks will securely hold everything you could wish to spit roast and they tighten securely with easy to use thumb screws.

name: Heavy Duty Rotisserie Kit for Built-in 32 Grill Models
description: Create restaurant quality meals right on your grill with the Napoleon Heavy Duty Rotisserie Kit for Medium Grills. Cook 12 - 15 lbs. of food easily; while the heavy-duty motor does all the work, smoothly spinning the food for grilled perfection. name: Hickory Wood Chips
description: The bold flavor produced by smoke from Hickory Wood Chips is bold and often associated with southern barbecue. Soak the Hickory Wood Chips in water for at least 30 minutes before you are ready to smoke. You don't have to use just water. Other liquid pairings go well with Hickory like beer, bourbon, ginger ale, Coke, apple juice, pineapple juice and even a cabernet sauvignon. Remove the wood chips from the liquid and place them in the Napoleon Smoker Tube, then directly onto the sear plates of your gas grill, on your burning charcoal in the Apollo® 3 in 1 Charcoal Grill and Water Smoker, or into the integrated Smoker Tray in the Napoleon Prestige PRO Series PRO665 Gas Grill. Once the Hickory Wood Chips begin to smoke, put the food you're adding flavor to on the grill. Keep the lid closed while smoking to get the most out of your Hickory Wood Chips.

name: Industrial Stainless Steel Grill Brush
description: As part of regular barbecue grill maintenance, it is recommended that your barbecue grill be heated and a grill cleaning brush used immediately after each cook to ensure the longevity of your cooking grids. Keep stainless steel barbecue grill cooking grids clean with this Industrial Stainless Steel Grill Brush. The built-in grid scraper will help power through any stubborn spots. The ergonomically curved handle provides extra leverage when scraping and cleaning. An extra-large built-in loop allows this barbecue grill brush to always be close at hand. The heavy-duty stainless steel bristles of the Industrial Stainless Steel Grill Brush are stiffer than those of brass bristles and should only be used on stainless steel barbecue grill grates. Whether you have made a family favorite or created a new culinary masterpiece, barbecue grill maintenance is easy with the Industrial Stainless Steel Grill Brush to help power away anything left on the cooking grids.

name: Infinity 40" Linear
description:
Unlocking Boundless Creativity: The Genesis Series Redefines Fireplace Design

In the world of home design, the fireplace has always held a special place. It's not just a source of warmth; it's a focal point that embodies style, personality, and comfort. However, for years, a significant challenge has plagued fireplace enthusiasts: how to eliminate the need for a safety screen while still providing the safety we all desire, and allowing homeowners the complete freedom to express themselves across all types of mediums.

Imagine a fireplace wall that becomes a canvas for your individuality, a reflection of your style and freedom, without being restricted to limited options of fireproof materials and internal design constraints. This vision seemed like a Herculean task, but the Genesis Series rose to the challenge and emerged as the game-changer in fireplace design.

Designing a fireplace that truly captures the essence of both safety and artistic expression is no small feat. The Genesis Series, however, took on this challenge with unwavering determination. They aimed to revolutionize the way we view fireplaces, eliminating the need for unsightly safety screens and opening up a world of creative possibilities for homeowners.

One of the most significant hurdles in this endeavor was addressing the inherent design challenges. Traditional fireplaces often necessitate extensive heat venting, heat dumps, intake, and exhaust louvers, all of which detract from the overall aesthetic appeal. The Genesis Series confronted these issues head-on, pushing their designers to think outside the box while still working within the confines of the fireplace structure. They wiped the slate clean, erasing the competition's limitations, and challenged their team to start afresh.

The result? The birth of the Genesis Series, a groundbreaking approach to fireplace design that redefines the very concept of safety and aesthetics. Here are some of the remarkable features that set the Genesis Series apart:

  1. Stunning High-Definition Views of the Flame: The Genesis Series offers breathtaking, high-definition views of the flames. It's not just a source of warmth; it's a mesmerizing visual spectacle that adds ambiance and charm to any living space.
  2. Sophisticated Lines: These fireplaces boast sophisticated lines and designs that seamlessly blend with any interior decor. Whether your style is modern, classic, or eclectic, the Genesis Series can complement your vision.
  3. Build Simplicity: Installation and construction have never been easier. The Genesis Series is designed with simplicity in mind, making it accessible to homeowners and professionals alike.
  4. Maintenance-Friendly: Homeowners will appreciate the practicality of the Genesis Series. Maintenance is hassle-free, allowing you to enjoy your fireplace without the worry of constant upkeep.

The Genesis Series isn't just a collection of fireplaces; it's a revolution in home design. It's a testament to the power of innovation and a commitment to pushing the boundaries of what's possible.
